response:
<<<api>>>: PrintWriter.write
<<<code>>>: try { printWriter.write("username=" + username + "&password=" + password + "&sessionid=" + sessionid + "\r\n"); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }
<<<explanation>>>: To create a session with Java, you can use the HttpURLConnection class to send a POST request to the login page of the website, passing in the necessary user data (username, password, and sessionid) in the request body. Once you receive a successful response, you can use the sessionid to download the csv file.
